Eric Ginosian

Welcome to my Three.Js Portfolio!

Computer Vision and Machine Learning Engineer focused on radar signal processing, production C++ pipelines, and reliable model deployment.

About Me

I earned my Associate degree in Math and Physics from Glendale Community College and my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from California State University, Northridge.

My recent work centers on computer vision and machine learning for radar imagery at Naval Air Warfare Center Weapons Division, where I design and deliver production-ready solutions for client deployment.

I build end-to-end software systems that include signal preprocessing, feature extraction, model integration, error analysis, and technical documentation that supports long-term maintainability.

I also bring client-facing experience from commercial sales, where I exceeded targets, improved retention, and developed tailored proposals for decision-makers.
